nav.div: Lafayette School CorporationÂ Â»Â Employment Â Â»Â COVID-19 Leave

br.h2: How do I request leave due to COVID-19?

ul.li:
Step 1 â Click on the following link to see if you qualify for paid leave for COVID-19:Â Covid-19 Leave Summary
Â Â
Step 2 â Notify your direct supervisor that you need to take a leave due to COVID-19.Â Please do not add your leave in AESOP.Â It will be added for you once the leave is approved.
Step 3Â â Request a COVID-19 Leave Form from Carrie Meyer at cmeyer@lsc.k12.in.us. An example of the form is here: COVID-19 Leave Form
Step 4 â E-mail your completed leave request form along with all documentation necessary to cmeyer@lsc.k12.in.us
Step 5 â You will receive an e-mail from HR when your leave has been approved and your approved COVID-19 days will be added to AESOP.

br.p: Note: Intermittent leave is only available if an employee is caring for his/her child (under the age of 18) whose school or place of child care has been closed, or the child care provider is unavailable due to COVID-19 precautions. Your request will not be finalized until HR receives your application and verification e-mail has been sent. Â If you have questions, please contact: Carrie Meyer, Benefits Specialist cmeyer@lsc.k12.in.us 765-771-6020
